title: 100 Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different way in detail

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different way: Seeing the Prophet in a dream symbolizes goodness, and jurists said that this dream is one of the most wonderful dreams that a person will see in his life. Follow him after that. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form Ibn Shaheen said: Seeing the Prophet in a dream other than his reality means strife and misfortunes, and may cause wars between people. Likewise, if the dreamer sees the Prophet in a strange form that is not befitting his position, then his coming days will make him very sad and will increase Whether his condition worsens as follows: Whether or not: If he is sick, he will be more tired than before, and if he recovers quickly from his illness, it may relapse, and thus his health condition will return to what it was. Second: Whoever was working in a job and did not complain about a defect in his financial condition. After this dream, his financial situation will get worse, either due to debts or leaving his job permanently and suffering from unemployment for a period of time. Third: One of the clearest images of the dreamer’s bad conditions in his life is the corruption of his social relationships, including his marital or family relationship. Sometimes, the vision of The Messenger in a dream in a way other than his real form means caring about the world, thinking a lot about it, and wanting to satisfy desires in a way that may conflict with the teachings of religion. If our elected Lord is seen in a dream in torn and ugly clothes, this indicates sins, but if he appears in these ugly clothes and turns into clothes Luxury befitting his great status, the dreamer can stop sinning and walk on his own path. The truth is love for God and His Messenger. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in the form of light according to Ibn Sirin indicates countless portents, knowing that the dream is one of the correct visions. If the prisoner sees the light of the Messenger, he will take his share of the world’s freedom and enjoyment. And one of the pleasures that God created for man. If a blind person sees the light of the Messenger and tells him that he will see soon, then the dream shows his recovery and God bestows upon him the blessing of sight. Many people see it. Seeing the dreamer being in a dark place and the light of our Prophet the Messenger filling the place and illuminating it means injustice or disturbances in life that may It makes his life dark, but because of his faith in God and His Messenger it will shine again and he will. Be full of blessings and peace. Seeing the Prophet in a dream without his image as an unmarried woman. If he sees him sick or his face is pale, then he may be hypocritical or suffer from ignorance of the teachings of religion and follow worthless superstitions. Therefore, she must delve deeply into her religion and learn a lot about the Sunnah of the Prophet in order to reach a high religious rank that will earn her a place in Paradise. If the Prophet appears in the Virgin’s dream while he is hunched or has a defect on his body, then the dream is completely different from real visions and has no meaning. Given Because seeing the Messenger different from his true form means a decline in the dreamer’s current circumstances, the dreamer may become emotionally disturbed and quarrel with his lover, and the fight may develop into a big problem that is difficult to solve and the two of you will separate. But if she saw him in his real form and spoke to her and did not hear his voice in the dream, this indicates her need for more worship or more.

title: Interpretation of a lizard in a dream: Seeing a lizard in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a lizard for a single woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether it was killed, eating meat, attacked me, chased me, big, small, a bite by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq, and more from Uromastyx. The lizard is considered one of the desert animals that are widespread, and the lizard is considered halal and can be eaten in some countries such as Saudi Arabia, and it resembles a lizard in its external shape, and it resembles a gecko but larger. The size of the interpretation of the lizard in a dream Ibn Sirin interpreted the lizard in a dream as a symbol of illness, and it is not desirable to see it in a dream. Whoever sees a lizard in his dream, his dream indicates that he will suffer from an illness. As for whoever sees the Bedouin lizard in his dream, it shows a deceitful, cunning man who cheats people with their money. The lizard in a dream symbolizes forbidden money. Ibn Sirin also showed in his interpretation of the dream of the lizard in a dream that it sometimes indicates anxiety and sadness that approaches the owner of the dream. The lizard in a dream also symbolizes the Bedouin man, who is a traitor of trust, who cannot be trusted with money, honor, or the like. In general, seeing a lizard in a dream is not good. In many cases, seeing a lizard in a dream indicates unpleasant things. He is a mutant man in a dream, and he refers to a Bedouin who loves to fight, and seeing him indicates illness. Whoever sees a lizard in a dream, his vision shows his illness, and the lizard in a dream is a deformed person who fights. Whoever sees a lizard in a dream, the dream also indicates doubt in earning a living in what is permissible and what is forbidden. The lizard is an Arab Bedouin who cheats people of their money. Whoever sees him gets sick and they say that he is evil and cursed because he is a mutant. The lizard is a savage man. Perhaps his vision indicates doubt about profit or ignorance of the origin. Interpretation of eating a lizard in a dream. As for the one who sees in his dream that he is eating a lizard, or buying a lizard, or hunting a lizard, his dream indicates his illness. Eating a lizard, buying it, and catching it in a dream also means eating forbidden things, ignorance, and hatred. As for the one who sees in a dream that someone bought a lizard, hunted it, or killed it, his dream is a warning from that person, and the owner of the dream must pay attention to this person in his wakefulness. Interpretation of a lizard chasing me in a dream. As for the one who sees in his dream that a lizard is chasing him, his dream indicates a fraudster who is chasing him to take his money with his cunning and cunning. Interpretation of a lizard hole in a dream. As for the one who sees in his dream a lizard hole, his dream shows the problems and disturbances that the owner of the dream faces. Interpretation of a lizard in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Seeing someone hunting and eating a lizard or buying it in a dream by Al-Nabulsi First: Seeing a lizard in general is said to mean a Bedouin who raises sheep and animals He is a famous or known person for fraud and takes people's money and property falsely and deceives them and conspires. The interpreter Al-Nabulsi, may God have mercy on him, said about seeing a lizard and chasing it in a dream, and his dream that seeing a lizard is also interpreted as a person who has been seriously injured. From a malicious act or a sign of ignorance. Seeing a lizard in a dream refers to the Bedouin Arabs who cheat people of their money, and it refers to the patient, and whoever sees a lizard in a dream will be affected by illness, and some interpreters said

title: What is the interpretation of buying perfume in a dream? Secrets of interpreting spraying perfume in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of buying perfume in a dream through this article. Perfume is considered one of the most beautiful products that you can buy. It makes the wearer feel comfortable, calm, happy and confident. Which makes it a favorite for many people. Interpretation of spraying perfume in a dream for single women, pregnant women, and married women. Perfume and adornment are among the means that a woman cannot refuse, whether inside or outside her home and on various occasions, especially social occasions. Perfume is made and extracted from it. Natural materials such as certain types of flowers such as lemon blossom, jasmine and violets. It is also extracted from herbs such as lavender and rosemary and chemicals such as choleretic acids. As for the symbols of this vision in reality, they carry many different meanings and sometimes indicate the goodness of the dreamer, especially if the smell of perfume Smart. . Singles specifically? We will answer this in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of buying perfume in a dream: If an unmarried girl dreams that someone is giving him perfume as a gift. This vision expresses this person’s desire to communicate with this girl. Seeing perfume in an unmarried girl’s dream generally symbolizes her short marriage. As for an unmarried girl’s dream of her perfume, it expresses that the dreamer will hear happy news soon. Interpretation of a dream about spraying perfume by Ibn Shahin. Interpretation Ibn Shaheen sees spraying perfume in a dream as a praiseworthy dream that expresses achieving what she wants in reality. Ibn Shaheen pointed out that if the dreamer is suffering from a health condition in reality and sees that she is spraying perfume on her clothes, this indicates her recovery from her illness, And God knows best. Seeing a bottle of perfume in a dream indicates the arrival of a happy event for the dreamer, which is marriage soon. If an unmarried woman dreams that she buys a bottle of perfume in a dream, this portends goodness and changes the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. When she dreams of inhaling the scent of perfume in a dream, this is interpreted It is a sign of happy news for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about perfume by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that wearing perfume in a dream indicates the great status that the dreamer enjoys from those around him and the love he receives from them. If perfume is sprayed on clothes in a dream, the meaning of this dream lies in ambition. The dreamer and his determination to achieve what he wants in reality. As for inhaling the sweet scent in a dream, it is a sign of kindness and an increase in money. When you dream of breaking a perfume bottle, this means that you will commit sins and disobedience. In the case of selling authentic perfume, this indicates the dreamer’s evasion and failure to fulfill his promises. The ground of reality. Interpretation of a dream about perfume by Al-Osaimi. As for Fahd Al-Osaimi’s interpretation of a dream about perfume, it is one of the praiseworthy dreams that express the arrival of goodness and happiness to the one who dreams of it. Al-Osaimi mentioned that this vision for an unmarried girl indicates that her marriage is imminent in reality. Interpretation of the smell of perfume in a dream for a single woman, if An unmarried girl felt in a dream that she smelled perfume. This vision symbolizes what God Almighty gives her in abundance of sustenance, knowledge, and a strong religion. And if the girl is alone in her sleep, she curses her.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream and what is the meaning of its appearance?

preview.html: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream and the meaning of its appearance The vision of the dress carries many different interpretations related to its vision depending on the nature and gender of the viewer, as well as the different situations that he saw in his dream related to the appearance of the dress and many other related interpretations. Let's see it in a dream that we present to you through this article. What is the interpretation of the dream of a dress? Ibn Sirin said that the white dress is very good, the red is a symbol of passion and impulsiveness for the visionary and the black portends unpleasant events, but the dress in general means good as long as it is elegant and attractive to show. User. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dress for a single woman? A long dress in an unmarried woman’s dream means meeting a religious young man who fears God inside her, while a short dress foretells her relationship with a young man who does not fear God inside her. It was also said that this may mean her marriage to a married, divorced, or widowed man. What is the interpretation of a dress in a dream for a married woman? There are many symbols associated with a married woman seeing a dress in a dream, as seeing her wearing a short dress indicates failure in the affairs of the home, children, or husband. As for the long dress, it reflects her good morals and heralds the happy events to come. Seeing a deceased person giving her a dress and presenting it is an indication of the good condition of her home and the stability of its condition, and seeing many dresses in her wardrobe or room is evidence that she will hear soon, and seeing her wearing it is a sign of righteous offspring that God will honor her with. Seeing a worn, unclean, and torn dress with symbols indicates problems, challenges, and a very bad psychological state that a married woman lives in and many problems and disputes with her husband that may lead to separation and divorce. As for seeing him as an old man and not Dirty, this indicates the return of stability to the home and family and the return of her relationship with her husband to normal. What is the interpretation of the dress in a dream for a pregnant woman? The dress in a pregnant woman's dream is related to its interpretation of the sex of the fetus, and the short dress heralds a female and the long dress for a male. A beautiful, elegant dress that is not dirty or torn heralds an easy and natural birth for the pregnant woman, while seeing a black dress is a hated sign, as it indicates a difficult and somewhat difficult birth. What is the interpretation of the dress in a dream for a young man? The dress in the dream of an unmarried young man is an indication of his marriage to a girl with a good reputation, good morals, and a share of religiosity and beauty, and seeing a white dress can mean a journey that brings very positive changes in his life. His vision of a torn and tattered dress reflects the psychological state he is currently living in, and his vision of a blue dress reflects the presence of problems between him and his girlfriend or fiancée. Seeing a young man buying his dress portends a new stage in his life full of happiness, joy, success and success in his affairs. Seeing a red dress indicates marriage to a previously married woman, and buying a blue dress can mean marriage to a woman You have power and a lot of money, and the pink dress heralds a future period of happiness and contentment.

title: Interpretation of a dead wife in a dream: Seeing my dead wife in a dream

preview.html: The husband sees his deceased wife and talks to her. He visits us at home and asks Ibn Sirin about a sick, happy, beautiful, naked man. The husband sees his deceased wife in a dream. We agreed that seeing a dream about someone who died shortly after him is not often considered one of dreams and dreams, because this is a feeling of longing. And longing for the dead. The best vision is to see the deceased in his best appearance and appearance, as this vision is a message to the viewer about the good ending and condition of the deceased. For the husband, his wife’s feeling of his wife’s separation from him is not the same as the husband’s separation from his wife, as a man can go through these situations quickly, Because of the nature of the man and his lack of need for others. As for the man who was recently separated from his wife by death, he often sees her in his dreams, and this is due to the pain of separation and the bitterness of grief, as the widower is still suffering from the loss of his life partner and her presence. . He is still immersed in his life and its corners, and therefore we cannot go far in translation. If the dead wife appears years after her departure, this is often a positive dream, especially if the dead wife appears in her most beautiful decorations and dress, wearing beautiful or green clothes. The dream is It serves as a spiritual message addressed to the husband telling him that he is in a high position, and the deceased wife can direct some words or commands in her husband’s dream. Therefore, the matter must be taken seriously, because if the deceased appears like this, he is only telling the truth because he is in the abode of truth. The death of the wife in a dream, or her death while receiving condolences and walking to her funeral, or even burying her in a dream, may indicate a deterioration in the relationship between the man and his wife. The dream in this context is a strong warning to the husband, warning him of the consequences of this dispute, which may lead to separation or divorce, God forbid, if he does not The husband retreats from his positions or actions. It could mean losing a woman in a dream or searching for her, problems and fears that the dreamer cannot face. title: 100 Interpretation of seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different way in detail

preview.html: What you do not know about seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different way: Seeing the Prophet in a dream symbolizes goodness, and jurists said that this dream is one of the most wonderful dreams that a person will see in his life. Follow him after that. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form Ibn Shaheen said: Seeing the Prophet in a dream other than his reality means strife and misfortunes, and may cause wars between people. Likewise, if the dreamer sees the Prophet in a strange form that is not befitting his position, then his coming days will make him very sad and will increase Whether his condition worsens as follows: Whether or not: If he is sick, he will be more tired than before, and if he recovers quickly from his illness, it may relapse, and thus his health condition will return to what it was. Second: Whoever was working in a job and did not complain about a defect in his financial condition. After this dream, his financial situation will get worse, either due to debts or leaving the job permanently and suffering from unemployment for a period of time. Third: One of the clearest images of the dreamer’s bad conditions in his life is the corruption of his social relationships, including his marital or family relationship. Sometimes, the vision of The Messenger in a dream in a way other than his real form means caring about the world, thinking a lot about it, and wanting to satisfy desires in a way that may conflict with the teachings of religion. If our Elect Lord is seen in a dream in torn and ugly clothes, this indicates sins, but if he appears in these ugly clothes and turns into clothes Luxury befitting his great status, the dreamer can stop sinning and walk on his own path. The truth is love for God and His Messenger. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in a different form according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the Prophet in a dream in the form of light according to Ibn Sirin indicates countless portents, knowing that the dream is one of the correct visions. If the prisoner sees the light of the Messenger, he will take his share of the world’s freedom and enjoyment. And one of the pleasures that God created for man. If a blind person sees the light of the Messenger and tells him that he will see soon, then the dream shows his recovery and God bestows upon him the blessing of sight. Many people see it. Seeing the dreamer being in a dark place and the light of our Prophet the Messenger filling the place and illuminating it means injustice or disturbances in life that may It makes his life dark, but because of his faith in God and His Messenger it will shine again and he will. Be full of blessings and peace. Seeing the Prophet in a dream without his image as an unmarried woman. If he sees him sick or his face is pale, then he may be hypocritical or suffer from ignorance of the teachings of religion and follow worthless superstitions. Therefore, she must delve deeply into her religion and learn a lot about the Sunnah of the Prophet in order to reach a high religious rank that will earn her a place in Paradise. If the Prophet appears in the Virgin’s dream while he is hunched or has a defect on his body, then the dream is completely different from real visions and has no meaning. Given Because seeing the Messenger different from his true form means a decline in the dreamer’s current circumstances, the dreamer may become emotionally disturbed and quarrel with his lover, and the fight may develop into a big problem that is difficult to solve and the two of you will separate. But if she saw him in his real form and spoke to her and did not hear his voice in the dream, this indicates her need for more worship or more.

title: What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream, and what is the meaning of its appearance?

preview.html: Ibn Sirin's interpretation of seeing a dress in a dream and the meaning of its appearance The vision of the dress carries many different interpretations related to its vision depending on the nature and gender of the viewer, as well as the different situations that he saw in his dream related to the appearance of the dress and many other related interpretations. Let's see it in a dream that we present to you through this article. What is the interpretation of the dream of a dress? Ibn Sirin said that the white dress is very good, the red is a symbol of passion and impulsiveness for the visionary and the black portends unpleasant events, but the dress in general means good as long as it is elegant and attractive to show. User. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dress for a single woman? A long dress in an unmarried woman’s dream means meeting a religious young man who fears God inside her, while a short dress foretells her relationship with a young man who does not fear God inside her. It was also said that this may mean her marriage to a married, divorced, or widowed man. What is the interpretation of a dress in a dream for a married woman? There are many symbols associated with a married woman seeing a dress in a dream, as seeing her wearing a short dress indicates failure in the affairs of the home, children, or husband. As for the long dress, it reflects her good morals and heralds the happy events to come. Seeing a deceased person giving her a dress and presenting it is an indication of the good condition of her home and the stability of its condition, and seeing many dresses in her wardrobe or room is evidence that she will hear soon, and seeing her wearing it is a sign of righteous offspring that God will honor her with. Seeing a worn, unclean, and torn dress with symbols indicates problems, challenges, and a very bad psychological state that a married woman lives in and many problems and disputes with her husband that may lead to separation and divorce. As for seeing him as an old man and not Dirty, this indicates the return of stability to the home and family and the return of her relationship with her husband to normal. What is the interpretation of the dress in a dream for a pregnant woman? The dress in a pregnant woman's dream is related to its interpretation of the sex of the fetus, and the short dress heralds a female and the long dress for a male. A beautiful, elegant dress that is not dirty or torn heralds an easy and natural birth for the pregnant woman, while seeing a black dress is a hated sign, as it indicates a difficult and somewhat difficult birth. What is the interpretation of the dress in a dream for a young man? The dress in the dream of an unmarried young man is an indication of his marriage to a girl with a good reputation, good morals, and a share of religiosity and beauty, and seeing a white dress can mean a journey that brings very positive changes in his life. His vision of a torn and tattered dress reflects the psychological state he is currently living in, and his vision of a blue dress reflects the presence of problems between him and his girlfriend or fiancée. Seeing a young man buying his dress portends a new stage in his life full of happiness, joy, success and success in his affairs. Seeing a red dress indicates marriage to a previously married woman, and buying a blue dress can mean marriage to a woman You have power and a lot of money, and the pink dress heralds a future period of happiness and contentment.

title: Interpretation of teeth in a dream and molars in a dream

preview.html: Meaning of lower teeth falling out: A single woman’s teeth are loose in a married woman’s hand. A lower molar falling out without blood. Interpretation of age in a dream: Age is a symbol of a person’s age, i.e. his age. The extraction of molar, age, or gab indicates the death of a relative or fears that relatives transmit to you. The upper jaw of men and the lower jaw of women [οι άνδρες είναι οι των των γυναικών γυναικών] If extraction indicates death or disease, the composition indicates birth or pregnancy [ If the extraction indicates death or illness, then the installation indicates birth or pregnancy, and if the extraction indicates death or illness, then the installation indicates birth or pregnancy. Seeing a tooth in a dream indicates the end of the term and the age for which it was written. All teeth indicate family, clan, boys, girls and boys. Teeth may indicate money, living, livestock, wages, property, vines, ammunition, death, life, division, and meeting. Teeth in a dream indicate deposits and secrets. Molars in a dream may indicate the opinion and choice of superior people. Newborns in a dream, followers, and idolaters. And four twins, and beautification with pure money or a child, and their yellowness or blackness in a dream indicates a change in the condition of what was given to him in the dream. To pull out some teeth in a dream is evidence of the destruction of some of the family or those we mentioned, and pulling out the tooth may indicate the arrival of the absent person or the death of the beloved: he said. Poet: And the partner who does not hope for eternity, his companionship, seeks my benefit and seeks a struggle that I have not seen since we were together and since I looked at him we were separated forever. If the king’s teeth become iron or copper, this indicates the strength of his army and the strength of his army. He becomes poor after losing his money or earning money from his home, from his animal, or from his mill, and if he saves something for the time of interest, his condition becomes ruined, his condition is ruined, and he may die and be afflicted. Life is cut short, and the loss of teeth indicates the obligation of fasting. If he pulled out his teeth with his own hand, or disposed of his money in a bad way, or harmed his family, or did something bad and regretted it, or made a profit from an obligatory debt and returned it, and this is in his mind if that appears in his hand. In a dream. If someone snatches it from him in a dream, this indicates his need for a mortgage or a sale for something that will adorn it or for something that is unavoidable. If he pulled out a tooth that happened to him while he was awake, this indicates the recovery of the one who harmed him, or took it from him, and perhaps this foretells the disappearance of worry and anxiety. Regarding his demands, it is. Renewing extracted teeth is evidence of compensation and profit after loss. Seeing the loss of teeth and molars in a dream. Teeth in a dream are the people of a man’s household. What happens in a dream reflects on the person to whom age refers. The upper fold is the father and uncle, the right is the father, and the left part is the uncle. If not He has a father and an uncle, then two brothers, two sons, or advisors, sympathetic friends. A man’s four-legged cousin or two friends who take his place. Great uncles or the place of their advice. Molar teeth in a dream indicate grandfathers and children whom one is proud of and loved by. The two sides The lower two are for the mother and aunt, the first

title: Interpretation of a dead wife in a dream: Seeing my dead wife in a dream

preview.html: The husband sees his deceased wife and talks to her. He visits us at home and asks Ibn Sirin about a sick, happy, beautiful, naked man. The husband sees his deceased wife in a dream. We agreed that seeing a dream about someone who died shortly after him is not often considered one of dreams and dreams, because this is a feeling of longing. And longing for the dead. The best vision is to see the deceased in his best appearance and appearance, as this vision is a message to the viewer about the good ending and condition of the deceased. For the husband, his wife’s feeling of his wife’s separation from him is not the same as the husband’s separation from his wife, as a man can go through these situations quickly, Because of the nature of the man and his lack of need for others. As for the man who was recently separated from his wife by death, he often sees her in his dreams, and this is due to the pain of separation and the bitterness of grief, as the widower is still suffering from the loss of his life partner and her presence. . He is still immersed in his life and its corners, and therefore we cannot go far in translation. If the dead wife appears years after her departure, this is often a positive dream, especially if the dead wife appears in her most beautiful decorations and dress, wearing beautiful or green clothes. The dream is It serves as a spiritual message addressed to the husband telling him that he is in a high position, and the deceased wife can direct some words or commands in her husband’s dream. Therefore, the matter must be taken seriously, because if the deceased appears like this, he is only telling the truth because he is in the abode of truth. The death of the wife in a dream, or her death while receiving condolences and walking to her funeral, or even burying her in a dream, may indicate the deterioration of the relationship between the man and his wife. The dream in this context is a strong warning to the husband, warning him of the consequences of this dispute, which may lead to separation or divorce, God forbid, if he does not The husband retreats from his positions or actions. It could mean losing a woman in a dream or searching for her, problems and fears that the dreamer cannot face. title: Interpretation of the bride in a dream Seeing the bride in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the bride for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether the white dress, or the bride’s dress on the wedding night, or the party, or the wedding, or more according to Ibn Sirin. The bride in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we see in a dream and it is very happy for one girl or man. Marriage is... The important things that each of us awaits in public life to start a new life and make the family and the bride or groom think that he is going well on the day of joy and what he will present at the wedding to all those present, and when you see it in a dream there are many important interpretations and connotations about it. Ibn Sirin explained to us In his great interpretations of seeing a bride or groom in a dream, there are many important interpretations and meanings that we must take into consideration. Interpretation of a dream about a bride in Nabulsi: If the bride is adorned in a dream, it is a fertile world, and whoever sees that he is a bride and does not see his wife, does not know her, does not name her, or is attributed to him, then he Die or be killed. A person. Seeing a veiled bride is a positive vision that foretells for the dreamer obtaining an inheritance and a lot of money. If a veiled bride appears in a dream and her happiness appears on her face, this is evidence that the dreamer’s wedding will be special and happy. If the dreamer sees that the veiled bride is sad and afraid, this means that he will suffer Disappointed in his real life. If the dreamer kisses the veiled bride in a dream, this indicates strong friendships that adorn the dreamer’s life. If the veiled bride kisses the dreamer, this is evidence of the dreamer’s health and safety. As for seeing an anxious bride in a dream, it indicates anxiety that will dominate the dreamer’s life. The real one. The sight of a veiled bride conflicting with her husband in a dream portends that sadness will soon enter the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of the bride in a dream. Seeing a bride or groom in a dream means radical changes in a person’s life. Seeing a wedding in a dream is a sign that goodness is imminent for someone. Marrying a woman whom the dreamer does not know in reality is evidence of his approach to life. Seeing a job seeker getting married is a sign of kindness. Seeing someone marrying one of his friends or family is evidence of the dreamer’s great honor. The wedding of the bride and groom in a dream is attended by people the dreamer does not know. Evidence of honor and a good reputation. For a man to see that he is between magic and joy, and that he is marrying a woman he does not know, and then she dies in a dream during the marriage, is evidence that he is abandoning his profession. A wedding in a dream is considered evidence of the profession that the person will work and leave. Seeing a man Riding a dog during the wedding instead of a horse is evidence that he works in a profession that involves many sins. A man seeing a bride or groom in a dream is a sign of kindness. If a man dreams that he is marrying a Christian woman, this means that he is working in a job that is against the law. Seeing someone getting married in a dream with his wife in life is evidence of goodness that will come to him in the near future. Marriage in a dream is a sign of kindness, joy, and contentment. A man seeing that he is with a dead woman is a sign of great goodness and compensation coming to him. Seeing a sick woman
